Mysterious ShogunMogi

By bigbang2k4 on Saturday, July 10, 2004 - 07:51 pm:

I dont know if anyone else have already posted this but i just got a ShogunMogi (Mogi/?) using the Spirited Away Dvd disk 1 and it had the skills Headbang, Splash and a weird chinese letter as its attacks. I checked on my monster book but its says its attacks are headbang dig and scratch. i went on my monster's bio and checked out his attacks. the weird chinese letter attack had all rank E stats and it uses no guts so i tried my ShogunMogi out on a battle right after i got him. I tried the weird chnese letter attack but it does nothin at all when i try to use it the camera just spins around and does nothing. so im really confused! did anyone else experienced this? is this a glitch on the game or somethin'?

By MRFury29 on Saturday, July 10, 2004 - 07:55 pm:

By Shadowscythe1234 on Saturday, February 25, 2006 - 09:57 am:

I figured out the mystery attack!
When used at the beginning of a battle like during the first 2 seconds the screen goes dark immediatly after this use any other attack and 9 times out of 10 it is a one hit k.o. even on monsters far stronger than you!
